pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deciphering Central Informative Nodes in Network Analysis // Computing, comparing, and demonstrating top informative centrality measures within a network. "CINNA: an R/CRAN package to decipher Central Informative Nodes in Network Analysis" provides a comprehensive overview of the package functionality Ashtiani et al. (2018) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bty819.
